name: UnpackIpaFile
description: Unpack an ipa file to prepare it for modifications.
author: Scott MacDougall

inputs.name: ipaPath
inputs.label: Path to IPA
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path to the ipa file you want to unpack.

outputVariables.name: unpackedIpaPath
outputVariables.description: The path to the unpacked ipa file.

outputVariables.name: unpackedIpaName
outputVariables.description: The name of the original ipa file.
